plot: This little "One Day Wonder" would become famous as Vanessa Del Rio's first movie. I worked with Vanessa many, many times, and there was no more delightful person to work with in the adult film business. She was a joy to be around.
title: China Doll
plot_es: This little "One Day Wonder" would become famous as Vanessa Del Rio's first movie. I worked with Vanessa many, many times, and there was no more delightful person to work with in the adult film business. She was a joy to be around.
